original_text: The people in Canaan did these bad things and the land became unclean. The people in Canaan did these bad things and the land became unclean.
korean_text: 너희가 전에 있던 그 땅 주민이 이 모든 가증한 일을 행하였고 그 땅도 더러워졌느니라

sentences.original_text: The people in Canaan did these bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 가나안 사람들은 이런 나쁜 일들을 했습니다
